body:
As for me it is my birthday on July 22 I am excited from what I am getting, it is called murdered, soul suspect.....

Prologue: There was a man, he was a detective he bragged about winning all his fights and never losing one. He was a dodgy one, one day he lost a fight, he got thrown out a window onto the ground . The killer came to him and shot him whilst he had a slight touch of light in him. A cop came and the killer shot him too.

After that part in the game you have to investigate your killer and you meet a girl on the way that the killer has targeted. 
it is out now
Preview: check the trailer it is an amazing game if anyone has it can you please tell me if it is good or not it looks amazing with the gameplay so be sure to see the trailer
